description:
A report by Publicis Sapient sheds light on the disparities between the C-suite and practitioners, dubbed the “V-suite,” in their perceptions and adoption of generative AI. The report reveals a stark contrast in how the C-suite and V-suite view the potential of generative AI. While the C-suite focuses on visible use cases such as customer... Read more »

The post Generative AI: Disparities between C-suite and practitioners appeared first on AI News.
title: Generative AI: Disparities between C-suite and practitioners
